Course_Name: [SS24] Applications of Robotics and Autonomous Systems

Discussions.Discussion_Name: 24 Apri Lecture in ZE-KI e.V.  Ernst-Reuter-Platz 2 10587 Berlin

Messages.Author: Yuan Xu
Messages.Content: Dear students, As you know our TEL building is closed, this week we will have our lecture in ZE-KI e.V. Ernst-Reuter-Platz 2 10587 Berlin https://ze-ki.de  We will bring you up in front the main entrance at about 14:00.

Messages.Author: Yuan Xu
Messages.Content: Group Full name 1 Wangdong Yin 1 Maximilian Alex 1 Truong Nam Tran 1 Jonas Peschel 1 Tino Nicksch 2 Jason Osayi 2 Sam Chamani 2 Doan Hoang Long Kästner 2 2 Adrian Salewsky 2 Yeqiao Xu 3 Mehmet Yasin Cifci 3 Ufuk Algac 3 Akram Salim Jawad Al-Saffah 3 3 Leunar Kalludra   4 4 4 4 Jonathan Leonard Zöllinger 4 4 Helena Schulz 4 Simon Thomas Thomes 4 Luisa Wittig 4 Anastasia Weiz

Messages.Author: Yuan Xu
Messages.Content: Dear students,  Some selected students can't join the lecture, so we have update the groups: everyone get chance to take the course.

Messages.Author: Bryan Oppong-Boateng
Messages.Content: Hello, In a recent post the following was said. Some selected students can't join the lecture, so we have update the groups: everyone get chance to take the course.  I don’t quite understand what that means. Unfortunately I wasn’t on the list that was published on Monday. Does the message posted today say that I can now participate?   Kind regards  Bryan

Messages.Author: Yuan Xu
Messages.Content: Hi Bryan,  Yes everyone who have done the survey can join. But if you have taken the lecture already, it doesn't make sense to take it again.
